item.description:
Now that the weather is getting colder, I've been looking for things for us to do indoors. I found this nice class at The Fitness Haven on State Street...

 

Enjoy the tranquility of Candlelight Yoga which focuses on relaxing into the deepest level of the body to help us return to a state of surrender and calm. On this Sunday evening, put your Daylight Savings Time to good use as we set our clocks back one hour to practice gentle yoga by candlelight.

All levels are welcome. No prior experience needed! Just come, wear something comfortable, and enjoy the benefits of letting go. The instructor will be Kristyn Zalota, a certified yoga teacher who will lead us through postures with breathwork.

Please try to arrive by 6:20 at the latest so you have time to get settled before we start.

The price is $10 per person if registering online. This is really not bad when most yoga classes nowadays cost at least $15-18. If you would like to pay at the door, the charge will be $15. Please note that rsvp's close on Friday Nov 2 at 11:30 pm!

 

To register online, click here.

You will go to the Fitness Haven Classes page

Click on the Events Tab (next to Classes Tab)

Scroll down to Candlelight Yoga 11/4/2012

Click the button, Sign Up Now!

The charge should only be $10.
item.name: Candlelight Yoga
